channel.title: Vengeance For Members Only :S

item.title: Vengeance For Members Only :S
item.dc:creator: @shortysean6 shortysean6
item.description:
@shortysean6 wrote:

yea but i dunno what to do…also how do i get my member command to save into my members.txt file?

[code] if (command.startsWith(“membership”)) {
String member = command.substring(11);

        sendMessage("Player " + member + " has become a Member!");

        for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
            if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
                if (PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(
                        member)) {
                    PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
                }
            }
        }

    }[/code]

coz when i relog im not member anymore

item.title: Vengeance For Members Only :S
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Youd have to make it check if they are a member, so make it check the boolean or whatever you have.

inCombat();
attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1);
setAnimation(1979);
txt4 = “Taste vengeance!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
RemoveAllWindows();
}
}
}

            sendMessage("You use vengence!");
            break;
